name: Reach-U
overview:
With more than 20 years of experience in the area of Location-Based and Geoinformatics Services, Reach-U has emerged as a key player in the Location-Based Services (LBS) market.

Our product portfolio, consisting of LBS Middleware, GIS Engine and LBS applications, is offered to mobile operators around the world. Reach-U applications are currently running commercially in diverse regions and commercial environments worldwide. Our products are available to over 100 million end-user around the world.

Fruitful cooperation with Ericsson has continued to this day with Ericsson remaining one of the main global sales and support partners for Reach-U. Reach-U and Ericsson joint solutions have been widely acknowledged commercial success within the mobile operator communities.

Reach-U employs over 70 highly qualified specialists. The main development and production unit is located in Tartu, Estonia, while global sales and support is provided through partners (e.g. Ericsson) all over the world. Reach-U holds ISO 9001:2000 quality process certificate for software development since 2006.

Safe ownership by private capital and balanced conservative investment strategy has given a stable financial base to the company and enables Reach-U to be profitable.
